okay. This probably isn't what you want to do. But one thing you *can* do is disable GDM (install sysv-rc-conf and just uncheck its' little box). The make a file ~/.xsession containing the lines '#/bin/bash' and 'metacity'. At that point, it will boot to a terminal, you can log in, and running 'startx' should start metacity.
